嶬嶬嶬

嶬字的基本解释

嶬
yí
〔崎嶬〕a.高耸险峻，如“（殿宇结构）上嶬嶬而重注。”b.喻骨瘦如柴，如“形枯槁以嶬嶬。”

嶬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐ］
［《集韻》語綺切，上紙，疑。］
(1)见“嶬嶬”。
(2)见“嶬”。

嶬字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶬； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页320第23
【玉篇】宜崎切【集韻】魚羈切，?音儀。【玉篇】山名。【集韻】山峰巉巖也。本作㕒。或作嶬。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】上崎嶬而重注。【註】崎嶬，高峻也。　又【廣韻】魚倚切【集韻】魚綺切，?音蟻。岌㠖，山高貌。　【集韻】亦作㠖。

嶬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嶬字的起名意思

形容高耸险峻。

嶬
Basic explanation of words
嶬
yí
〔綬嶬〕a. Towering and steep, such as "(Temple structure) is placed on the top of the temple and re-entered." b. It is as thin as firewood, such as "The shape is withered to the ground."
嶬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐ］
["Ji Yun", the words are beautiful, on paper, suspicious. ]
(1) See "嶬嶬".
(2) See "嶬".
嶬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶬; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 320 to 23
[Jade articles] Yiqi cut [Jiyun] Fish cut, sound instrument. 【Jade articles】The name of the mountain. [Jiyun] Mountain peaks and rocky rocks. This is for 㕒. Or make up. 【Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Temple Fu】Betting heavily on Uzaki. [Note] Qiqiu, high and steep.　[Guangyun] Fish Yiqie [Jiyun] Fish Qiqie,? Sound Ant. The mountain is high and the appearance is high.　【Jiyun】also made 㠖.
嶬

Name meaning
Describe towering and steep.
yí, yǐ
